main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Meridian, Idaho on October 23, 1963, involving radar and visual contact with a circular object.
interesting points: The object was visible for 6 minutes,The object hovered over the area before disappearing and reappearing,It was observed by a commercial pilot and one adult,The sighting was recorded by both ground radar and visually,The object emitted a deep, pulsating sound that was described as irritating.
witness description: a commercial pilot and one adult
